channel.title: The Servers
channel.description:
Why is it that the servers on the server status page will be registered and they arn't up, i swear, out of about 200, 20 of them work and about 15 of them are laggy and now point, and the other 5 are stupid, im just asking that it be's upgraded since if tried a bunch of servers(about 30) and none work, and also i will log into a server and play for a lil bit, and then get disconnected. I'll exit out of the server status page and open a new one and look for the name and it appears to be up but when i try to log in it says "error connecting to server" ill have the right I.P.and Port but it doesnt work.
Just throwing this question out to people who have the same problem :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2008, 04:14:01 PM[/size][hr]alos,i dont know if this is the right section, so sorry if it is, ill move it if it is in the wrong one

item.title: The Servers
item.dc:creator: @Pk_Gamer3 Pk Gamer3
item.description:
@Pk_Gamer3 wrote:

yes, but i woldnt know that since ive never made a server, ivetried, and my parents wont let me use our router

Read full topic

item.title: The Servers

item.description:
@cman19283746 wrote:

its bc mopar has a shitty ss and server owners turn em on them off. its stupid like how u didnt use your common sence…

thatz why i made a server.
